patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,300 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto"
+    xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent">
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_0"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_0"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_point"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_point"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_dot"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_delete"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_0" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_delete"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_delete"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_equal"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_point" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_equal"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/orange"
+        android:text="@string/calc_equal"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_delete" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_1"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_1"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_0"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_2"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_2"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_2"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_point"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_3"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_1" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_3"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_3"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_delete"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_sum"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_2" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_sum"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_sum"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_equal"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_3" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_4"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_4"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_1"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_5"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_5"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_5"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_2"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_6"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_4" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_6"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_6"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_3"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_sub"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_5" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_sub"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_sub"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_sum"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_6" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_7"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_7"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_4"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_8"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_8"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_8"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_5"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_9"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_7" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_9"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_9"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_6"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_multiply"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_8" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_multiply"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_multiply"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_sub"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_9" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_clear"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/red"
+        android:text="@string/calc_c"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_7"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_percent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_percent"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_percent"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_8"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_plus_minus"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_clear" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_plus_minus"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_plus_minus"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_9"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toStartOf="@id/button_divide"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_percent" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_divide"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:layout_marginBottom="112dp"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_divide"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_multiply"
+        app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent"
+        app:layout_constraintStart_toEndOf="@id/button_plus_minus" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/calc_text"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:layout_gravity="end"
+        android:hint="0"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calculation_size"
+        android:textAlignment="textEnd"
+
+        app:layout_constraintBottom_toTopOf="@id/button_clear"/>
+
+</androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,219 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<GridLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:layout_gravity="bottom"
+    android:columnCount="4">
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/calc_text"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:layout_row="0"
+        android:layout_column="0"
+        android:layout_columnSpan="4"
+        android:layout_gravity="end"
+        android:hint="0"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calculation_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_clear"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/red"
+        android:text="@string/calc_c"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_percent"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_percent"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_plus_minus"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_plus_minus"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_divide"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_divide"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_7"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_7"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_8"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_8"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_9"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_9"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_multiply"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_multiply"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_4"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_4"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_5"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_5"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_6"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_6"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_sub"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_sub"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_1"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_1"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_2"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_2"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_3"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_3"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_sum"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/light_blue"
+        android:text="@string/calc_sum"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_0"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_0"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_point"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_dot"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_delete"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/grey"
+        android:text="@string/calc_delete"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/button_equal"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_margin="@dimen/calc_margin"
+        android:backgroundTint="@color/orange"
+        android:text="@string/calc_equal"
+        android:textColor="@color/black"
+        android:textSize="@dimen/calc_text_size" />
+</GridLayout>

@@ -7,4 +7,8 @@
     <color name="teal_700">#FF018786</color>
     <color name="black">#FF000000</color>
     <color name="white">#FFFFFFFF</color>
+    <color name="orange">#FF9800</color>
+    <color name="grey">#BFBCBC</color>

 </resources>

@@ -0,0 +1,6 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<resources>
+    <dimen name="calc_text_size">20sp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="calc_margin">5dp</dimen>
+    <dimen name="calculation_size">30sp</dimen>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -1,3 +1,23 @@
 <resources>
     <string name="app_name">CalculatorJM</string>
+    <string name="calc_0">0</string>
+    <string name="calc_1">1</string>
+    <string name="calc_2">2</string>
+    <string name="calc_3">3</string>
+    <string name="calc_4">4</string>
+    <string name="calc_5">5</string>
+    <string name="calc_6">6</string>
+    <string name="calc_7">7</string>
+    <string name="calc_8">8</string>
+    <string name="calc_9">9</string>
+    <string name="calc_divide">/</string>
+    <string name="calc_multiply">*</string>
+    <string name="calc_c">C</string>
+    <string name="calc_percent">%</string>
+    <string name="calc_plus_minus">+/-</string>
+    <string name="calc_delete">DEL</string>
+    <string name="calc_dot">.</string>
+    <string name="calc_equal">=</string>
+    <string name="calc_sum">+</string>
+    <string name="calc_sub">-</string>
 </resources>
\ No newline at end of file
